title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com> wrote in message: news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not size correctly. It does not match the width of the property sheet column. Instead, it is smaller than the column width, causing visual misalignment.
EB: I would expect the ComboBoxCellEditor to always match the width of the property sheet column. This behavior should be consistent with the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Select a cell that uses the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the combobox is smaller than the column width, causing visual misalignment.
